titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 50th Anniversary of the Crop Science Society of America.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/26/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 50th anniversary year of the Crop Science Society of America, and commends the Society for 50 years of dedicated service to advancing crop science. Acknowledges the promise of the Society to continue enriching the lives of U.S. citizens by improving stewardship of the environment, combating world hunger, and enhancing the quality of life. Requests the Secretary of the Senate to transmit an enrolled copy of this resolution to the President of the Crop Science Society of America.
